title: Founder's Office Intern
description: A hands-on, generalist role that sits at the center of a fast-moving startup. This is a part-time internship designed for someone who wants to experience the full founder journey â€” from operations to customer success to product execution to social media and everything in between.

title: AI Intern
description: Work across core application workflows, including non-AI features such as APIs, business logic, and integrations. Use your knowledge of AI models, prompt engineering, and agentic systems to embed intelligence and automation into these applications.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description: Lead the development of high-quality, scalable user interfaces using React, Mantine, and modern frontend tooling. Collaborate closely with product and design teams to create seamless, high-performance user experiences.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: Architect and implement backend systems using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and distributed processing frameworks. Own system scalability, reliability, and performance. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver robust APIs and data workflows.

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Build, train, and deploy machine learning models for document understanding, OCR post-processing, credit risk scoring, and workflow automation. Collaborate with backend and data teams to productionize models at scale.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description: Work across the stack to build high-performance applications. Implement APIs, integrate machine learning endpoints, and deliver optimized frontend experiences. Ensure end-to-end robustness and participate in architectural decisions.
